original_text: When morning came, Jacob saw that he had slept with Leah! He said to Laban, ‘You have done a very bad thing to me! I worked for you to get Rachel as my wife. Why have you deceived me?’
korean_text: 야곱이 아침에 보니 레아라 라반에게 이르되 외삼촌이 어찌하여 내게 이같이 행하셨나이까 내가 라헬을 위하여 외삼촌을 섬기지 아니하였나이까 외삼촌이 나를 속이심은 어찌됨이니이까

sentences.original_text: Jacob saw that he had slept with Leah
You have done a very bad thing to me
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 나에게 매우 나쁜 일을 했습니다

sentences.original_text: to get Rachel as my wife
